text: 10 Jan 2025 New YA Books to Devour for Fans of Six of Crows If you couldn’t get enough of the cunning heists, morally complex characters, and richly built worlds in Six of Crows, you’re in for a treat. The world of young adult literature is brimming with thrilling new stories that will satisfy your craving for high-stakes adventures and unforgettable characters. Whether you love a good antihero, a bit of magic, or a gripping plot full of twists, these fresh YA releases are ready to sweep you away. Get ready to dive into your next obsession! Admins: Simulation’s End by David Horn Release Date: January 6 2025 What if you discovered you were simply a player in a computer simulation? What if it was about to be deleted? Four teens stumble upon a mysterious cabin that unlocks strange powers, revealing they’re part of a vast simulation overseen by powerful ‘Admins’ that want to delete the simulation. Now they’re in a race-against-time to save the world. Buy on Amazon Labyrinth Arcanist (Astra Academy Book 5) by Shami Stovall Release Date: January 9 2025 Gray Lexly has returned to Astra Academy to train himself for the ultimate confrontation. Legendary arcanists from across the world are gathering to assist in the ultimate battle of life and death, but will it be enough to stop the rampaging Death Lords who have amassed power in the abyssal hells? Buy on Amazon Invaders 1 by Nick Clausen Release Date: December 20 2024 A strange, glowing object lands in the forest. Tim is the only one who sees it. Venturing out to investigate, he discovers animals infected with a mysterious black growth. When he returns to his cabin, he realizes the horrifying truth: whatever disease the object brought to Earth, Tim has caught it too. Buy on Amazon No Place Left to Hide by Megan Lally Release Date: January 7 2025 Hanging out with her crush by the bonfire is the perfect end to the night. Except it isn’t the end. An old truck starts aggressively tailing Brooke and her best friend on the isolated road toward home. Someone thinks they know the truth about “the incident,” and they won’t stop until it’s all out in the open. This terrifying drive is about to bring out Brooke’s worst fears…if she survives it. Buy on Amazon Callihan: The Earps by L.J. Martin Release Date: January 7 2025 Survival in Tombstone means more than just holding your ground. Can Conn protect his adopted family and stand his ground against every enemy, or will the dust of the frontier finally claim him? Buy on Amazon A Language of Dragons by S. F. Williamson Release Date: January 7 2025 In an alternate London in 1923, one girl accidentally breaks the tenuous truce between dragons and humans in this sweeping debut and epic retelling of Bletchley Park steeped in language, class, and forbidden romance. Perfect for teen fans of Fourth Wing and Babel. Buy on Amazon meghan Recommended Posts
html:
10 Jan 2025

New YA Books to Devour for Fans of Six of Crows

If you couldn’t get enough of the cunning heists, morally complex characters, and richly built worlds in Six of Crows, you’re in for a treat. The world of young adult literature is brimming with thrilling new stories that will satisfy your craving for high-stakes adventures and unforgettable characters. Whether you love a good antihero, a bit of magic, or a gripping plot full of twists, these fresh YA releases are ready to sweep you away. Get ready to dive into your next obsession!

Admins: Simulation’s End

by David Horn

Release Date: January 6 2025

What if you discovered you were simply a player in a computer simulation? What if it was about to be deleted? Four teens stumble upon a mysterious cabin that unlocks strange powers, revealing they’re part of a vast simulation overseen by powerful ‘Admins’ that want to delete the simulation. Now they’re in a race-against-time to save the world.

Buy on Amazon

Labyrinth Arcanist (Astra Academy Book 5)

by Shami Stovall

Release Date: January 9 2025

Gray Lexly has returned to Astra Academy to train himself for the ultimate confrontation. Legendary arcanists from across the world are gathering to assist in the ultimate battle of life and death, but will it be enough to stop the rampaging Death Lords who have amassed power in the abyssal hells?

Buy on Amazon

Invaders 1

by Nick Clausen

Release Date: December 20 2024

A strange, glowing object lands in the forest. Tim is the only one who sees it. Venturing out to investigate, he discovers animals infected with a mysterious black growth. When he returns to his cabin, he realizes the horrifying truth: whatever disease the object brought to Earth, Tim has caught it too.

Buy on Amazon

No Place Left to Hide

by Megan Lally

Release Date: January 7 2025

Hanging out with her crush by the bonfire is the perfect end to the night. Except it isn’t the end. An old truck starts aggressively tailing Brooke and her best friend on the isolated road toward home. Someone thinks they know the truth about “the incident,” and they won’t stop until it’s all out in the open. This terrifying drive is about to bring out Brooke’s worst fears…if she survives it.

Buy on Amazon

Callihan: The Earps

by L.J. Martin

Release Date: January 7 2025

Survival in Tombstone means more than just holding your ground. Can Conn protect his adopted family and stand his ground against every enemy, or will the dust of the frontier finally claim him?

Buy on Amazon

A Language of Dragons

by S. F. Williamson

Release Date: January 7 2025

In an alternate London in 1923, one girl accidentally breaks the tenuous truce between dragons and humans in this sweeping debut and epic retelling of Bletchley Park steeped in language, class, and forbidden romance. Perfect for teen fans of Fourth Wing and Babel.

Buy on Amazon


meghan
